titleStmt.title: The fame and confession of the fraternity of R: C: Commonly, of the Rosie Cross. With a præface annexed thereto, and a short declaration of their physicall work. By Eugenius Philalethes.
Fama fraternitatis. English.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666.
Andreä, Johann Valentin, 1586-1654, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Giles Calvert, at the black spread Eagle at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A translation with original preface, by Thomas Vaughan (i.e. Eugenius Philalethes), of: Fama Fraternitatis, oder, Entdeckung der Brüdershafft des löblichen Ordens des RosenCreutzes, attributed to Johann Valentin Andreä.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black spread Eagle at the West end of Pauls
